creator: HALGES
descriptionHtml:
Korba – Your One-Stop Platform for Seamless Transactions!
Saving you time to do more is at the heart of what we do! With Korba, you can send money, top up airtime and data, pay utility bills, and even purchase event tickets with your Mobile Money Wallet or Visa Card—all in just a few taps!

Here’s What You Can Do on Korba:
1. Funds Transfer – Send money instantly across all networks and banks in a snap!

2. Airtime & Data Purchase – Stay connected! Buy airtime and data bundles for yourself or others anytime, anywhere, on all networks.

3. Bill Payments – Say goodbye to long queues! Pay your electricity, water, TV subscriptions effortlessly and keep your services running.

4. Event Ticketing – Purchase event tickets to your favorite shows right from Korba—no stress, no last-minute rush!

No more long lines, app switching, or delays—just fast, reliable, and secure transactions at your fingertips!

appDetails.developerAddress:
Loc: No.2 Portuphy Street,
Nii Owoo Avenue, Westlands.
P. Add: P.O.Box GP 18376, Accra, Ghana
Tel: +233(0) 20 040 4010
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. A redesigned interface for a smoother, more modern experience.

2. Stronger KYC checks and protection to keep your transactions safe and secure.

3. Engaging in-app notifications to stay updated with real-time alerts and important updates.

4. Option to personalize your profile by uploading your picture to make your Korba account truly yours.
